RFCs and MTPs for systems of all criticality including mission critical Provide innovation support including data migration performance tuning and security administration to hundreds of application recovery methods Configure and install SQL Server on Windows and MySQLMariaDB on Linux Upgrade SQL Server with minimal downtime using AlwaysOn Availability Groups Thrived on change while providing
